reviewText: The individual I purchased this for broke his arm and he has enjoyed many happy hours watching this DVD
Our grandson loves everything volcano and enjoys playing it over and over again.

The Ptaranodon family and all their adventures keep me happy.
I had some difficulty figuring out how to program one episode at a time,j
instead of playing all the episodes at once.  But I finally did, and the
fun continues. Next to the Big Bang group, I'd rather spend time with the
Ptaranodons any day.
It was a gift for my son, it is his favorite show. Movie has multiple episodes all dealing with different creatures under the sea.
